TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted a megalomania hospitalization.

I wish wisdom.

Granted, you now know everything about knowing nothing.

I wish for max rep power.

Granted, but max power corrupts maximally (I looked it up, I swear),and you get assassinated by the internet police.

I wish for the ability to predict an infinite number of moves ahead in any turn based game.

Granted, all of your predictions are wrong.

I wish for WishCeptionTM Mark Whatney style please.

Whatney? I can't hear you, and no one else can either.

I wish for [iframe] BBcode, although it would be sure to turn out poorly.

Granted, it turned out wondefully. The forum went down, and had to revert to this version again.

I wish for WishCeptionÃ¢â‚¬â€¹TM

Granted, but the design documents for WishCeptionÃ¢â€žÂ¢ (and anybody who has ever heard of them) are sucked into a black hole, rendering all knowledge of them irretrievable.

I wish for the ability to turn drywall into white bread.

Granted, but the bread still tastes like drywall.

I wish I knew the Ultimate Question of Life, the Universe, and Everything.

Granted. Nobody believes you.

I wish I had Creative Mode with commands in this universe.

Granted. You can only use the command /help.

I wish for something to put here.

Granted, but you already have something put there so it doesn't change.

I wish for world peace.

Granted the world is now in pieces.

I wish for the ability to grant my own wishes.

Granted. They're terrible wishes

I wish for more Kopernicus planet packs.

Granted, but once installed it deletes all your KSP saves in addition to removing any trace of KSP on your computer. You have to buy KSP again.

I'll try this again.

I wish for Futurama to be revived once more.

Granted, you get 10 minutes of love footage before...

DENIED

I wish for UltimateDankMLGWishCeptionTM.

Dank-ted, n0c0per. butt hte UltimateDankMLGWishCeptionTM are illuminati. (X-files theme song plays)

I wish that Sanik would b 3slow5me.

Granted, you are 3fast5life, and die instantly.

I wish to become the DankMemeLord.

Granted .. but you will be come the KRAKEN after 1 nanosecond.

I wish I hae a premium account of minecraft.

Granted for 1 minutes before someone realizes you hacked their account and uses Mojang against you.

I wish to use the Kraken only in ways I want.

Granted, but the Kraken lets you think you use it how only you want while in fact, it uses you like it wants.

I wish for a car. Specifically, not many kilometers driven, affordable, not too old and not red or yellow.

Granted, it has no engine.

I wish for a rocket to launch my rover to Tylo

Granted, but it doesn't work as you never said it had to.

I wish for kerbals to exist IRL and for them to visit us.

Granted, they turn Earth into a giant booster.

I wish to be the MLGMemeLord

Granted, but the lawsuit of stealing the name leaves you broken

I wish for the perfect rocket to fly everywhere i want

The game crashes every time you fly it.

I wish for my cat to into space.
